name: RainatMama'sHouse
0:
”Alexa, open Rain At Mamas House”
”Alexa, start Rain At Mamas House”
”Alexa, launch Rain At Mamas House”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain at mamas house
des:
This skill serves a simple purpose – it lets you hear the sound of a rainy morning in Chicago. Just say YES following the welcome prompt and the rain will begin.

One day my mama sent me a video of the rain in her backyard. It sounded amazing. So I called her and walked her through how to record audio on her phone using the Voice Memos app. Explaining this took about 20 minutes. Once she got it working, I asked her to leave her phone on the back porch for a while. And then I made this skill so you all could hear it too.

Sure there are lots of rain sound skills. But this is my mama's rain.

Skill Icon from The Noun Project (by Chameleon Design)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
